overview:
Entrepreneurial mind, constantly trying to think of new ideas and ways to bring them to market.

Andrew is originally from Australia. His mother and father are from San Francisco and England respectively. He came to the Bay area in 2004 to pursue a degree in Entrepreneurship, immersing himself in the Bay Area startup culture.

Andrew ended up graduating cum laude from SFSU and has been gaining entrepreneurial experience in a number a fantastic startups.

Currently Andrew is working on his 3rd startup. He has previously worked on a daily deals website, a taxi sharing app and now a peer to peer solution for parking.

While working on his own projects he has gained fantastic experience working for Limos.com and more recently Quantcast.

With a constant backlog of ideas in the pipeline, Andrew is looking forward to bringing Parkplease to the public in 7/12.
